entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as crawling to the four-poster and collapsing onto it, panting, with a broken leg. ("Ron crawled to the four-poster and collapsed onto it, panting, his white face now tinged with green, both hands clutching his broken leg.")

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is described as sprawled at the bottom of the wall, watching Harry walking slowly nearer with a wand pointing straight at Black's heart. ("Black was sprawled at the bottom of the wall. His thin chest rose and fell rapidly as he watched Harry walking slowly nearer, his wand pointing straight at Black’s heart.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as walking slowly nearer to Black with a wand pointing straight at Black's chest. ("Black was sprawled at the bottom of the wall. His thin chest rose and fell rapidly as he watched Harry walking slowly nearer, his wand pointing straight at Black’s heart.")

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one to whom Black sold Harry's parents. ("You sold them to Voldemort. That’s all I need to know.")

relationships.description: Harry's wand is pointed at Black's heart. ("Black was sprawled at the bottom of the wall. His thin chest rose and fell rapidly as he watched Harry walking slowly nearer, his wand pointing straight at Black’s heart.")
Harry's wand is still pointed at Black's chest. ("Harry stopped right above him, his wand still pointing at Black’s chest, looking down at him.")
Black sold Harry's parents to Voldemort. ("You sold them to Voldemort. That’s all I need to know.")
